title: Hull Moving Average
description: Smooth, responsive moving average for trend analysis.
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("Hull Moving Average", overlay=true)
hmaValue = ta.hma(close, 20)
plot(hmaValue, title="HMA", color=color.aqua)

title: RSI Indicator
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("RSI", overlay=false)
rsiValue = ta.rsi(close, 14)
plot(rsiValue, title="RSI", color=color.blue)
hline(70, "Overbought", color=color.red)
hline(30, "Oversold", color=color.green)

title: MACD Strategy
author: Community

title: Bollinger Bands
description: Volatility bands around a moving average.
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("Bollinger Bands", overlay=true)
length = 20
mult = 2.0
basis = ta.sma(close, length)
dev = mult * ta.stdev(close, length)
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev
plot(basis, color=color.blue)
plot(upper, color=color.red)
plot(lower, color=color.green)

title: Ichimoku Cloud
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("Ichimoku Cloud", overlay=true)
tenkan = ta.sma(high[9] + low[9], 2)
kijun = ta.sma(high[26] + low[26], 2)
senkouA = ta.sma(tenkan + kijun, 2)
senkouB = ta.sma(high[52] + low[52], 2)
plot(tenkan, color=color.blue)
plot(kijun, color=color.red)
plotcandle(senkouA, senkouB, senkouA, senkouB, "Cloud", color.green)

title: VWAP
description: Volume Weighted Average Price for intraday analysis.
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("VWAP", overlay=true)
vwap = ta.vwap(high, low, close, volume)
plot(vwap, color=color.purple)

title: Stochastic Oscillator
description: Compares closing price to price range for momentum.
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("Stochastic", overlay=false)
[k, d] = ta.stoch(close, high, low, 14)
plot(k, color=color.blue)
plot(d, color=color.red)
hline(80, color=color.red)
hline(20, color=color.green)

title: ATR Indicator
description: Measures market volatility with Average True Range.
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("ATR", overlay=false)
atr = ta.atr(14)
plot(atr, color=color.orange)

title: Fibonacci Retracement
author: Community
code:
//@version=5
indicator("Fibonacci Retracement", overlay=true)
high_price = ta.highest(high, 20)
low_price = ta.lowest(low, 20)
diff = high_price - low_price
plot(high_price - diff * 0.236, color=color.blue)
plot(high_price - diff * 0.382, color=color.green)
plot(high_price - diff * 0.618, color=color.red)

title: Moving Average Crossover
description: Signals based on fast/slow MA crossovers.
author: Community
